lines: One must know how to get by in this nasty world.
I have already forgotten more than you will ever learn.
I know a few tricks and am, shall we say, extremely nimble.
But do not enquire about my secrets. They shall be mine and mine alone.
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
I will find my way around. May you find luck without my skills.
